price: (35) And they[1235] said, "We are more [than the believers] in wealth and children, and we are not to be punished."
arabic: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
footnotes: [1235]- The affluent ones in general or the people of Makkah specifically.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqālū naḥnu aktharu amwālan wa-awlādan wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
